Headline: Temporary Southbound #9 Ashland Reroute near Ashland/16th
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted near Ashland/16th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 15th, Paulina,18th, Ashland, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Ashland/16th.

Allow extra travel time.
